outputs.output_descr:
The global objective of the project is to provide tools and establish a learning platform for integration adaptation to climate change within the development planning of GEF-eligible countries. 
The project has three outcomes:
1.  State of knowledge on planning, implementing and integrating adaptation captured
2.  Knowledge sharing advanced & tools for integrating adaptation in development created, including functional knowledge base;
3.  Global ALM established and widely utilized

project_title: PIMS 3257  CC MSP: Adaptation Learning Mechanism
